Create a PHP function that calculates the factorial of a number.
solution:
<?php
  function factorial($n) {
    if ($n <= 1) {
      return 1;
    }
    return $n * factorial($n - 1);
  }

  $number = 5;
  echo 'Factorial of ' . $number . ' is ' . factorial($number);
?>
